name: Charlie Chan in Panama
summary_text: Inspector Chan investigates a group of travelers, one of whom is a saboteur.

name: Deng yi ge ren ka fei

summary_text: When a high profile judge commissions Jack Irish to locate a mysterious red book, Jack is thrown into a world of sexy club owners, drug dealers and unhinged killers.

summary_text: A girl insults a bully on internet. He starts calling her repeatedly and finally finds her. On an escape attempt she trips and their lips meet. Being the first to kiss him, she now has to promise to marry him. Is life over or...?

name: Infection

summary_text: In the wake of the World Trade Center attacks, a naval carrier with civilians on board is ordered in combat mode.

name: Arkadasim Seytan
summary_text: Struggling musician sells his soul to the devil for instrumental fame.

name: Doosukeltha
summary_text: When Munna finds himself in a hospital due to a sting operation he conducted for a channel, he falls for Dr Aliya. But it seems Aliya's life is in danger too. Chinna decides it's his turn to help her.

name: Domovoy
summary_text: A novelist struggling with writer's block enlists the aid of an assassin for some inspiration -- fully unaware that he is being set up to take the blame for a murder.

name: N (Io e Napoleone)
summary_text: When Napoleon arrives to Elba Island in exile, Martino, an idealist teacher and writer, plots to kill him.

name: De tasjesdief

name: Terminator II
summary_text: In a polluted future Venice researchers work to improve the situation. One day, unknown forces start killing them. A team of soldiers and a couple of civilians is sent to investigate. Soon, they encounter strange murderous creatures.

name: Enigma
summary_text: A C.I.A. Agent tries to infiltrate Soviet intelligence to stop a murderous diabolical plot.

name: Viens chez moi, j'habite chez une copine
summary_text: Guy is fired from is job, and asks to stay with his friend and his girlfriend in their apartment. The longer he stays, the more disaster he creates.

name: Autopsy
summary_text: A young pathology doctor interning in a morgue tries to cope with a wave of suicides. A woman she just met kills herself, but she suspects someone close to her might have killed her.

name: The Delicate Delinquent

name: Original Gangster
summary_text: The stoic chronicles of Castor, orphaned as a child, forced to survive in the wild and his colorful journey through the criminal underworld of London.

name: Kattappanayile Rithwik Roshan
summary_text: A young man struggles to break stereotypes and get into the film industry.

name: The Coed and the Zombie Stoner

summary_text: A young and talented soccer player goes to Botswanga, the country of his ancestors, together with his agent Didier. Paranoid president and dictator Bobo puts pressure on Didier to make his player join the Botswanga national team.

name: Exploding Sun
summary_text: A historic space launch triggers a solar-storm event that could have cataclysmic repercussions for the planet if it isn't stopped in time - and time is running out.

name: Comme les autres
summary_text: They were the perfect loving couple, well, almost. Emmanuel wanted a child but Philippe didn't. One day, however, Emmanuel decides to take the plunge, at the risk of losing Philippe. But how do you make a child when you are gay?

name: We Bare Bears: The Movie
summary_text: Grizz, Panda, and Ice Bear embark on an adventure to Canada after an agent from the Department of National Wildlife Control tries to put an end to their hi-jinx.

name: Vampire Bats
summary_text: Freshmen friends of the Tate University go to an underground party in the woods nearby the local cemetery. After a death, two of the students are arrested until a professor suggests that bats might be the real culprit.

name: Insan
summary_text: A police offer is hellbent to arrest a notorious terrorist who is planning to destroy Mumbai, as well as to settle a personal score with him.

name: Whisky Romeo Zulu

name: Funeral Home
summary_text: A young woman arrives at her grandmother's house, which used to be a funeral home, to help her turn the place into a bed-and-breakfast inn. After they open, however, guests begin disappearing or turning up dead.

name: City That Never Sleeps
summary_text: Johnny Kelly, who plans on resigning from the police force and leaving his wife the next day, has a very eventful last night on duty.

name: Invasion, U.S.A.
summary_text: A group of people at a bar witness the unfolding events of a Soviet invasion of the USA.

name: Go for Broke!
summary_text: The story of Japanese-American soldiers who fought in Europe during World War II.

summary_text: An American stand-up comedy special starring Marlon Wayans who jokes about politics, racism, hip-hop, gay rights, and raising kids.

summary_text: A story about how people in a village deal with everyday problems in Punjab and learn how to live.

name: Brother Nature

name: Smash Cut
summary_text: After his latest film is met with horrible reviews, Able Whitman sets out to prove the critics wrong by finding inspiration in his cast and crew. Sometimes great art requires great sacrifice, and the director always gets final cut.

name: Simply Black
summary_text: A politically incorrect comedy, about the role of black people in French society.

name: 3 Needles
summary_text: A three-paneled look at the worldwide A.I.D.S. crisis. Three tragic stories taking place in South Africa, China, and Montréal.

name: Blue Hill Avenue
summary_text: A child of a middle class home with solid moral values is lured into a world of crime and corruption.

name: Love and a Bullet
summary_text: A hitman falls in love with the boss's girlfriend, who may just be his next target.

name: Claire Dolan
summary_text: A high-priced call girl, shocked by her mother's death, decides to get out of the business and have a baby. The steps that she takes to free herself from her pimp and find a father for the baby are the central story of this movie.

name: Up the Sandbox

name: Bless the Beasts & Children
summary_text: A group of social misfits at a summer camp for boys run away to save penned-in buffaloes from a rifle club's slaughter.

name: Hotel

name: Flame of Barbary Coast
summary_text: A cowboy competes with a gambling tycoon on the Barbary Coast for the hand of a beautiful dance-hall queen.

summary_text: When winter break arrives, a boy and his friends are joined by the new girl in town for a prolonged snowball fight.

name: Nar

name: Kadakh

name: The Dancer and the Thief

name: Dead Heat
summary_text: A heart problem forces the cop Pally to retire, and his wife Charlotte is separating him. Charlotte makes Pally's half-brother Ray visit, and he suggest buying a race horse will cheer him up. He does, but then a mob boss steals the horse.

name: Winter People
summary_text: A young widower moves with his daughter into a North Carolina mountain town in 1934. He quickly takes up with a young woman with an illegitimate baby. First he must prove himself to her ...                See full summary »

summary_text: Off the coast of Panama, there is an island with a female penal colony, run by a sadistic superintendent. When several prisoners mysteriously die, leading to a breakout and mutiny, an extensive investigation of the horrific events begins.

summary_text: A dead man tells us about his feelings and his life.

name: Una moglie bellissima
summary_text: Miranda is a beautiful Italian girl, she is married to Mariano. They live in a village called Anghiari (Tuscany).

summary_text: Metallica and the San Francisco Symphony perform a live concert together at Chase Center in San Francisco.

name: Uahan segye
summary_text: A light hearted action noir about a part time gangster who tries to be a full time daddy and wants to live a peaceful life with his family despite of being in trouble almost all the time, due to his profession.

name: Run
summary_text: This action movie is filled with romance and adventure. As Abhisek fights for his life against the forces of crime and injustice, he meets Bhoomika, who captures his heart.

name: Andi Ommsen ist der letzte Lude
summary_text: In Hamburg's red-light district, where the Albanian mafia rules the prostitution business, the harmless sandwich-seller Andi Ommsen is hired to take care of the mob leader's wife while he is away. Now Andi needs to act like the pimp king.

summary_text: A woman becomes immersed in a brutal love triangle when an unwelcomed admirer kills her abusive husband even though she's already having an affair.

summary_text: When a ship sinks during a storm, a slave from the industrial island of Plutonia is washed up on the beaches of paradise island Melonia, where the "all-powerful" wizard Prospero and his strange friends reside.

name: The Hasty Heart
summary_text: In the final days of WW2, in a M.A.S.H. unit in Burma, a severely wounded corporal watches in dismay as fellow soldiers pack-up to return home but a caring nurse and five remaining soldiers bring him solace.

name: Dnevnik Diane Budisavljevic
summary_text: The story of Diana Budisavljevic, who embarks on a campaign of rescuing more than 10,000 children from the Ustasha camps in Nazi-occupied Croatia. A dramatized retelling mixed with archival material and interviews with survivors.

name: Running Wild

name: Poor Boy's Game
summary_text: On his release from prison for the brutal beating of a black man, Donnie, a young white boxer, is coached by his victim's father, George for an upcoming fight against a talented and vengeful opponent, Ossie.

A troubled young woman, haunted by her mother's ghost, is suddenly confronted by paranormal events which are wreaking havoc on her small college town. She struggles to understand the meaning of these supernatural events...

name: Haiku Tunnel
summary_text: Josh has an offer to "go perm" at his employer and the first task is to mail 17 high priority letters....something that seems a little difficult to do.

name: Dudes
summary_text: 3 punk loving dudes in NYC need a change and drive a VW Beetle to California. After rednecks kill one of them in Arizona, they want justice. A cute girl helps them.

summary_text: A boozy Broadway actress comes out of a 12-week cure to face the problems of her best friends as well as her needy daughter. She tries to balance the terrors of returning to work with the ...                See full summary »

summary_text: Kelly and her father, Hank, receive news that he has inherited an estate in a different country. Upon their arrival, he's shocked to discover that not only has he inherited the estate, but also a kingdom.

summary_text: A loyal worker, Sundaram takes orders from his boss Ekamabaram, even when Ekamabaram asks Sundaram to smuggle a valuable idol in his car.

summary_text: A few months before the revolution in Tunisia, 18 year-old Farah has a passion for life and sings in a political rock band. Her mother, knowing the dangers of Tunisia, wants her to pursue a career as a doctor.

name: The Carer
summary_text: When the question is to be or not to be, there is only one answer.

name: Blood Runs Cold
summary_text: Winona, a successful artist looking to get away from her stressful life. Her manager rents her a house in her home town where she runs in to an old boyfriend. They go back to the house, only to find out it is not as empty as they assumed.

summary_text: Tintin and Captain Haddock try to discover what is so desirable about their old and apparently worthless ship.

summary_text: The day before a young man is to be executed for killing his girlfriend, his alcoholic father shows up to try to prove his innocence.

name: Three Smart Girls
summary_text: Three sisters scheme to reunite their divorced parents before their wealthy father marries a conniving gold digger.

name: Tôkyô no kôrasu

summary_text: After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results.

name: The Divorce of Lady X
summary_text: Divorce lawyer Everard Logan thinks the woman who spent the night in his hotel room is the erring wife of his new client.

name: Suzy
summary_text: Believing a German spy has killed her new husband, a struggling chorus girl flees to Paris where she meets and marries a World War I pilot, whose carefree ways brings about unexpected results.
